news.title: Snoop Dogg becomes co-owner of Swansea City
news.summary: “My love of football is well known, but it feels special to me that I make my move into club ownership with Swansea City," said the rap legend.

news.title: Kneecap, Fontaines D.C. and more form alliance of artists speaking up for Palestine

news.title: Robbie Williams releases new single 'Spies' and reveals track list for upcoming album
news.summary: New album Britpop is out on October 10

news.title: Extreme skydiver Felix Baumgartner dies in paragliding accident
news.summary: The 56-year-old was best known for his jump from the edge of space in 2012

news.title: Netflix uses AI generated visual effects for the first time
news.summary: The streaming service has reported record profits amid the growing use of artificial intelligence in content creation.

news.title: Who is the most reprehensible political figure on earth?
news.summary: Vladimir Putin and Benjamin Netanyahu continue to stand apart. Complicit in the latter’s genocide in Gaza, meanwhile, has been UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer.

news.title: Metallica to release single-day tickets for Aviva Stadium shows
